verses.verse: ( You Showed Favor to Your Land) לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀ <WH5329> lam·naṣ·ṣê·aḥ For the choirmaster. לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> liḇ·nê- of the sons קֹ֬רַח <WH7141> qō·raḥ of Korah. מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <WH4210> miz·mō·wr A Psalm רָצִ֣יתָ <WH7521> rā·ṣî·ṯā You showed favor יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD; אַרְצֶ֑ךָ <WH776> ’ar·ṣe·ḵā to Your land, שַׁ֝֗בְתָּ <WH7725> ḇə·tā You restored שְׁבוּת <WH7622> šə·ḇūṯ from captivity. ( Or restored the fortunes of Jacob) יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ Jacob

נָ֭שָׂאתָ <WH5375> nā·śā·ṯā You forgave עֲוֺ֣ן <WH5771> ‘ă·wōn the iniquity עַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> ‘am·me·ḵā of Your people; כִּסִּ֖יתָ <WH3680> kis·sî·ṯā You covered כָל־ <WH3605> ḵāl all חַטָּאתָ֣ם <WH2403> ḥaṭ·ṭā·ṯām their sin. סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> se·lāh Selah

אָסַ֥פְתָּ <WH622> ’ā·sap̄·tā You withheld כָל־ <WH3605> ḵāl all עֶבְרָתֶ֑ךָ <WH5678> ‘eḇ·rā·ṯe·ḵā Your fury; הֱ֝שִׁיב֗וֹתָ <WH7725> hĕ·šî·ḇō·w·ṯā You turned from מֵחֲר֥וֹן <WH2740> mê·ḥă·rō·wn Your burning anger אַפֶּֽךָ׃ <WH639> ’ap·pe·ḵā ....

שׁ֭וּבֵנוּ <WH7725> ū·ḇê·nū Restore us, אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hê O God יִשְׁעֵ֑נוּ <WH3468> yiš·‘ê·nū of our salvation, וְהָפֵ֖ר <WH6565> wə·hā·p̄êr and put away כַּֽעַסְךָ֣ <WH3708> ka·‘as·ḵā Your displeasure עִמָּֽנוּ׃ <WH5973> ‘im·mā·nū toward us.

הַלְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> hal·‘ō·w·lām forever? תֶּֽאֱנַף־ <WH599> te·’ĕ·nap̄- Will You be angry בָּ֑נוּ Prep│1cp ( bā·nū) with us תִּמְשֹׁ֥ךְ 4900 V-Qal-Imperf-2ms ( tim·šōḵ) Will You draw out אַ֝פְּךָ֗ 639 N-msc│2ms ( ’ap·pə·ḵā) Your anger לְדֹ֣ר 1755 Prep-l│N-ms ( lə·ḏōr) to all וָדֹֽר׃ 1755 Conj-w│N-ms ( wā·ḏōr) generations?

הֲֽלֹא־ <WH3808> hă·lō- not אַ֭תָּה <WH859> ’at·tāh Will You תָּשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> tā·šūḇ again, תְּחַיֵּ֑נוּ <WH2421> tə·ḥay·yê·nū revive us וְ֝עַמְּךָ֗ <WH5971> wə·‘am·mə·ḵā that Your people יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <WH8055> yiś·mə·ḥū- may rejoice בָֽךְ׃ Prep│2ms ( ḇāḵ) in You?

הַרְאֵ֣נוּ <WH7200> har·’ê·nū Show us יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> ḥas·de·ḵā Your loving devotion, וְ֝יֶשְׁעֲךָ֗ <WH3468> wə·yeš·‘ă·ḵā Your salvation. תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> tit·ten- and grant לָֽנוּ׃ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) us

אֶשְׁמְעָ֗ה <WH8085> ’eš·mə·‘āh I will listen מַה־ <WH4100> mah- to what יְדַבֵּר֮ <WH1696> yə·ḏab·bêr will say; הָאֵ֪ל׀ <WH410> hā·’êl God יְה֫וָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD כִּ֤י׀ <WH3588> kî for יְדַבֵּ֬ר <WH1696> yə·ḏab·bêr He will surely speak שָׁל֗וֹם <WH7965> šā·lō·wm peace אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to עַמּ֥וֹ <WH5971> ‘am·mōw His people וְאֶל־ <WH413> wə·’el- and חֲסִידָ֑יו <WH2623> ḥă·sî·ḏāw His saints; וְֽאַל־ <WH408> wə·’al- He will not יָשׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> yā·šū·ḇū let them return לְכִסְלָֽה׃ <WH3690> lə·ḵis·lāh to folly.

אַ֤ךְ׀ <WH389> ’aḵ Surely קָר֣וֹב <WH7138> qā·rō·wḇ [is] near לִירֵאָ֣יו <WH3373> lî·rê·’āw to those who fear Him, יִשְׁע֑וֹ <WH3468> yiš·‘ōw His salvation לִשְׁכֹּ֖ן <WH7931> liš·kōn may dwell כָּב֣וֹד <WH3519> kā·ḇō·wḏ that His glory בְּאַרְצֵֽנוּ׃ <WH776> bə·’ar·ṣê·nū in our land.

חֶֽסֶד־ <WH2617> ḥe·seḏ- Loving devotion וֶאֱמֶ֥ת <WH571> we·’ĕ·meṯ and faithfulness נִפְגָּ֑שׁוּ <WH6298> nip̄·gā·šū have joined together; צֶ֖דֶק <WH6664> ṣe·ḏeq righteousness וְשָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> wə·šā·lō·wm and peace נָשָֽׁקוּ׃ <WH5401> nā·šā·qū have kissed.

אֱ֭מֶת <WH571> ’ĕ·meṯ Faithfulness מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> mê·’e·reṣ from the earth, תִּצְמָ֑ח <WH6779> tiṣ·māḥ sprouts וְ֝צֶ֗דֶק <WH6664> wə·ṣe·ḏeq and righteousness מִשָּׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> miš·šā·ma·yim from heaven. נִשְׁקָֽף׃ <WH8259> niš·qāp̄ looks down

גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- will indeed יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> yit·tên provide what is good הַטּ֑וֹב <WH2896> haṭ·ṭō·wḇ ..., וְ֝אַרְצֵ֗נוּ <WH776> wə·’ar·ṣê·nū and our land תִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> tit·tên will yield יְבוּלָֽהּ׃ <WH2981> yə·ḇū·lāh its increase.

צֶ֭דֶק <WH6664> ṣe·ḏeq Righteousness לְפָנָ֣יו <WH6440> lə·p̄ā·nāw before Him יְהַלֵּ֑ךְ <WH1980> yə·hal·lêḵ will go וְיָשֵׂ֖ם <WH7760> wə·yā·śêm to prepare לְדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> lə·ḏe·reḵ the way פְּעָמָֽיו׃ <WH6471> pə·‘ā·māw for His steps.
